metadata.feature_description: Complete folder lifecycle management including creation, deletion, moving, and synchronization with permission controls

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel from Content menu
steps.expected: Assets panel opens showing Home folder contents
steps.actual: Assets panel opened showing folder tree and file tiles

steps.action: Click 'Add Folder' button
steps.expected: Add folder form appears with Name and Type fields
steps.actual: Add folder form appeared with Name field, Type dropdown (Standard selected by default)

steps.action: Enter folder name 'TestFolder01' and click Save
steps.expected: Folder is created and appears in the folder list
steps.actual: Folder 'TestFolder01' was created and appeared in the Home folder view

steps.action: Click on TestFolder01 to navigate inside
steps.expected: View changes to show contents of TestFolder01 (empty)
steps.actual: Navigated inside TestFolder01, breadcrumb shows HOME > TESTFOLDER01

steps.action: Click 'Add Folder' and create 'SubFolder01'
steps.expected: Nested folder is created inside TestFolder01
steps.actual: SubFolder01 was created and appeared inside TestFolder01

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create folder with invalid name (special characters)

steps.action: Click 'Add Folder' and enter name 'Invalid<>Folder' with special characters
steps.expected: System should reject invalid folder name
steps.actual: Form showed name 'Invalid<>Folder' entered

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Error message displayed indicating invalid characters
steps.actual: Error displayed: 'Invalid characters'. Folder was not created.

steps.action: Click 'Add Folder' and leave Name field empty
steps.expected: Form shows empty name field
steps.actual: Add folder form displayed with empty name field

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Validation error displayed requiring folder name
steps.actual: Error message 'Text is required.' displayed

steps.action: Attempt to create folder with existing name 'TestFolder01'
steps.expected: Error message indicating folder already exists
steps.actual: Error displayed: 'A folder with that name already exists under the parent folder.' Duplicate folder was prevented.

steps.action: Create folder 'ToDelete' for deletion test
steps.expected: Folder is created
steps.actual: ToDelete folder was created and visible in folder list

steps.action: Hover over ToDelete folder to reveal action icons
steps.expected: Edit, Move, and Delete icons appear
steps.actual: Action icons appeared on hover (pencil, arrow, trash)

steps.action: Click trash/delete icon
steps.expected: Delete confirmation dialog appears
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete ToDelete?'

steps.action: Click 'Yes' to confirm deletion
steps.expected: Folder is deleted and removed from list
steps.actual: ToDelete folder was deleted and no longer appears in the folder list

steps.action: Delete TestFolder01 which contains SubFolder01
steps.expected: Warning about deleting folder with contents
steps.actual: Delete confirmation appeared asking to delete TestFolder01 (which contains SubFolder01)

steps.action: Confirm deletion
steps.expected: Folder and all contents are deleted
steps.actual: TestFolder01 and its contents (SubFolder01) were deleted successfully

steps.action: Create folder 'MoveMe' and hover to reveal move icon
steps.expected: Move icon (arrow) is visible
steps.actual: MoveMe folder created, move icon visible on hover

steps.action: Click move icon and select 'Images' folder as destination
steps.expected: Folder tree picker appears to select destination
steps.actual: Move dialog appeared with folder tree, Images folder selected

steps.action: Confirm move to Images folder
steps.expected: Folder is moved to new location
steps.actual: Notification: 'A folder called MoveMe has been added into the folder /Images/'. MoveMe now appears in Images folder.

steps.action: Navigate to Images folder and click 'Sync this folder and subfolders' button
steps.expected: Folder synchronization is triggered
steps.actual: Sync button clicked, folder contents refreshed/synchronized

steps.action: Click 'Add Folder' and examine Type dropdown
steps.expected: Type dropdown shows available folder types
steps.actual: Type dropdown displayed with options: Standard, Secure, Database

steps.action: Select 'Secure' type and enter name 'SecureFolder'
steps.expected: Form shows Secure type selected
steps.actual: Secure type selected, name entered as 'SecureFolder'

steps.action: Click Save to create secure folder
steps.expected: Secure folder is created with lock icon
steps.actual: SecureFolder created and displayed with lock icon indicating secure storage

steps.action: Hover over SecureFolder and click edit/pencil icon
steps.expected: Folder edit panel opens with Details and Permissions tabs
steps.actual: Edit panel opened showing folder details including Name field, Workflow, Versioning options

steps.action: Change folder name from 'SecureFolder' to 'RenamedSecureFolder'
steps.expected: Name field accepts new value
steps.actual: Name field updated to 'RenamedSecureFolder'

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Folder is renamed and displayed with new name
steps.actual: Folder renamed successfully, now shows as 'RenamedSecureFolder' in the folder list

steps.action: Open folder edit panel and click Permissions tab
steps.expected: Permissions management UI is displayed
steps.actual: Permissions tab opened showing: Filter By Group dropdown, Select Role dropdown, permissions grid with roles (Administrators, Content Editors, Content Managers, All Users, Registered Users) and permission columns (Browse Folder, View Folder, Add, Copy, Delete, Manage, Write to Folder)

observations: Folder actions (edit, move, delete) appear on hover over folder tiles - not immediately visible until hover
Folder types available: Standard (default), Secure (files stored with .resources extension), Database
Secure folders display a lock icon to indicate secure storage type
Permissions grid shows inherited permissions with lock icons and editable permissions with checkboxes
Workflow options available for folders: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow
Versioning can be enabled per folder
Code shows SynchronizeFolderRequest supports recursive synchronization via boolean Recursive property
DeleteFolderRequest includes UnlinkAllowedStatus property for folder mapping unlinking control
